item.title: A brief overview
item.description: To mark the U.S. publication of the book, we published a thread on Twitter offering a summary overview of the contents and key findings of the book, along with some figures. We reproduce the thread here (edited for reading as a continuous document). Our book, Covering Muslims: American Newspapers in Comparative Perspective, is now out in the United States with Oxford University Press and available at independent booksellers, as well as Amazon.

item.title: When and where can the book be purchased?
item.description: Covering Muslims: American Newspapers in Comparative Perspective, has been available as an electronic book since November 2021. Paper shortages and supply chain issues aggravated by the COVID-19 pandemic pushed the print publication dates back a bit. In the United States, the book has been available since December 14, 2021, in both hardcover and paperback. In most of Europe, it has been available since 24 March 2022, for instance at Amazon UK.
